text: Doly Sayontoni is a Bangladeshi playback singer and businessman. She releases 15 solo album, over 100 duet and mixed albums and also sings over 700 Bengali cinema. ==Filmography== ==Notable songs== * "Kalia" * "Hey Jobok" * "Nitaigonj" * "Amar Matir Gase Lao Dhoirase" ==References== ==External links== * Category:Bangladeshi singers Category:Living people Category:Bangladeshi pop singers Category:Bangladeshi female singers Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Doly Sayontoni
